sentences.sentence: Life in basements for frontline residents as Ukraine gears up for a long-awaited counter-offensive.

sentences.sentence: Pakistan remains gripped by tension following the arrest of opposition leader Imran Khan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Amid heightened security, he appeared in a special court in police headquarters in Islamabad, where a judge extended his detention for eight days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The former prime minister was arrested yesterday on corruption charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The government denies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: His supporters claim that the case is politically motivated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: An Islamabad high court has declared his arrest under proper legal procedures and under lawful authority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So this is an arrest which is not motivated by any political victimization.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is an arrest which was not done at the behest of the government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Riots exploded across the country following Khan's detention, leading to the death of at least one person.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Khan is the seventh former prime minister to be arrested in Pakistan's turbulent political history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's southern front lies just seven kilometers from the town of Orykiv,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: where some 1,000 residents are trying to survive incessant shelling, waiting for a major Ukrainian offensive. Life is mostly lived in basements, where meals are taken and touches of spring keep up spirits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Outside, there's so much destruction.

sentences.sentence: I'm very sad and I cry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The shelter is beneath a local school, and it's where people can take a shower, wash clothes and get a meal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: As the war grinds on, food is becoming increasingly important across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: In Kyiv, volunteers are getting creative to feed soldiers fighting on the front.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: They're using nuts and dried fruit to make up energy bars for the troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: And they're also adapting a Ukrainian favorite, the traditional beetroot and cabbage soup, borscht.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: They're making a version from dried vegetables, which can then be rehydrated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At the front, the main thing is ammunition and food.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's what they shoot at and what the soldiers consume to have strength.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Food is very convenient in this way because it is compact. Such a package can be stored in a backpack, even in a pocket in a jacket, and can be worn with a bulletproof vest."

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Palestinian militants have fired more than a hundred rockets into Israel in response to two straight days of airstrikes, which left 19 dead, including three leaders of Palestinian Islamic Jihad and a dozen civilians, including four women and four children.

Two Palestinian youths were killed and another wounded. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Although the charge that Trump raped her was rejected, Carroll was awarded $5 million in damages in a judgment that may haunt Trump's re-election ambitions.

sentences.sentence: Trump immediately lashed out with a statement on his social media site, claiming again that he does not know Karl and described the verdict as a disgrace and a continuation of the witch hunt against him.

sentences.sentence: In Vienna's Naschmarkt, customers are feeling the pinch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Economics experts say the Austrian government is not doing enough to bring inflation under control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: And it's consumers who are picking up the tab. Latvia, Slovakia, Lithuania, Estonia and Austria have the highest inflation rates in the Eurozone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: And while the rate is declining in the first four countries, it's still going up month on month in Österreich.
